sentence.Network_en: Edelweiss ( Leontopodium alpinum ) is one of the best known European mountain flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 是菊科的一种花,也叫火绒草.

sentence.Network_en: A hut! The white logo is Austrian national flower? Edelweiss .
sentence.Network_cn: 一座小木屋! 那个白色标记就是奥地利的国花 —— 火绒草.

sentence.Network_en: Edelweiss, edelweiss, bless my homeland forever.
sentence.Network_cn: 雪绒花, 雪绒花, 为我祖国祝福吧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German, from edel 'noble' + weiss 'white'

means.word_mean: 1. alpine perennial plant native to Europe having leaves covered with whitish down and small flower heads held in stars of glistening whitish bracts
